mapper.select: select p.project_id, s.current_times, s.first_data, s.current_data, s.current_laser_change, s.total_laser_change, sc.detection_type_id from ${tableName} s, project p, report_config r, sensor sen,statistic_chart sc where s.current_times Between #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and r.project_id = p.project_id and p.project_id = sen.project_id and sen.smu_channel = s.smu_cms_channel and sen.sensor_number = s.sensor_id and sen.smu_number = s.smu_cms_id and sen.monitor_type in(select parameter from report_para) and sc.project_id = sen.project_id and sc.table_name = #{tableName} GROUP BY s.sensor_id
